synopsis: Because Rein was a weak and simple beast tamer, he was expelled from the hero's group but that didn't stop his desire to be an adventurer. By taking simple quests afterwards he has a destined encounter with a strong cat girl.

title.en: The Beast Tamer Who Got Kicked Out From His Party Meets a Cat Girl From the Superior Race
title.jp: Yuusha Party wo Tsuihou Sareta Beast Tamer, Saikyoushu no Nekomimi Shoujo to Deau
